==Translingual==

===Etymology===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|i}} - many ([[廿]]) termites ([[禼]]) taking grain ([[米]]) and hiding it in their nest ([[穴]]), hence the definitions "[[secretly]]", "[[stealthily]]", "to [[steal]]". In modern form, 米 looks like [[釆]] because 廿 has become one stroke and merged with 米.
